data.title: BIF - Burundian Franc rates, news, and tools
data.meta_description: Get Burundian Franc rates, news, and facts. Also available are services like cheap money transfers, a currency data API, and more.
data.text:
BIF - Burundian Franc

The Burundian Franc is the currency of Burundi. Our currency rankings show that the most popular Burundian Franc exchange rate is the BIF to USD rate. The currency code for Francs is BIF , and the currency symbol is FBu. Below, you'll find Burundian Franc rates and a currency converter.
